Uses of Package
oaidtb.boosters

Packages that use oaidtb.boosters
oaidtb.boosters   
oaidtb.boosters.costSensitive   
oaidtb.gui   
oaidtb.misc   
 

Classes in oaidtb.boosters used by oaidtb.boosters
AdaBoostECC.AlfaAndBetaContainer
          Container class for alfa and beta.
AdaBoostM1
          Class for boosting using AdaBoostM1.
AdaBoostOC
          Class for boosting using Schapire's AdaBoostOC.
Booster
          Abstract class defining the structure ("iterative & interactive") and common options to our boosting implementations.
ErrorUpperBoundComputer
          Interface for boosters that can calculate any kind of theoretical guaranteed error measure upper bound (academical & validation stuff); obviously, it isn' t neccessary for the booster to work and it can be harmful for the algorithm performance, so the implementations of this interface must be carefully revised to not become a bottleneck.
IterativeUpdatableClassifier
          Interface for classifiers that can be updated (refined) at any time by performing more iterations
MulticlassExtensibleBooster
          Interface for boosters which can handle binary nominal problems and can be extended to the multiclass case using a "one-per-class" approach.
WeightedClassifierVector
          Container class, type-conscious, to store classifiers with its vote weights.
 

Classes in oaidtb.boosters used by oaidtb.boosters.costSensitive
AdaBoostMH
          Class for boosting using Schapire & Singer's AdaBoostMH.
Booster
          Abstract class defining the structure ("iterative & interactive") and common options to our boosting implementations.
IterativeUpdatableClassifier
          Interface for classifiers that can be updated (refined) at any time by performing more iterations
MulticlassExtensibleBooster
          Interface for boosters which can handle binary nominal problems and can be extended to the multiclass case using a "one-per-class" approach.
WeightedClassifierVector
          Container class, type-conscious, to store classifiers with its vote weights.

          Interface for classifiers that can be updated (refined) at any time by performing more iterations
